summary:
The way we treat cancer is changing with new treatments that offer targeted therapies and combination regimens to include immunotherapy.  This makes it an exciting time in the oncology pharmacy world as the pharmacist’s role continues to expand to a more collaborative model with an increase in medication management. 

As the Enloe Regional Cancer Center Pharmacy Manager, I enjoy building relationships with health care professionals, promoting drug safety and appropriateness, maximizing technology efficiency, budgeting, and evaluating new drug therapies for formulary consideration all to provide the best patient care.  

One of the greatest aspects of my job is working with my pharmacy team members.  There is a high since of camaraderie within the department that allows us to work hard and have fun while doing it.  Work without fun is just work! 

Enloe Health is in the process of building a new Regional Cancer Center that projects to open its doors in early 2026.  My involvement includes designing the infusion pharmacy and collaborating with other departments for workflow efficiency.

organizations.name: Campbell Univeristy College of Pharmacy Class of 2017
organizations.description:
- Acted as the liaison between the students and professors that included; organizing test  schedules, reserving classrooms, taking attendance, resolving conflicts, and coordinating class  events  
- Planned the Buddy Backpacks Food Drive, Falcon Children’s Home Clothing Drive, Campbell Pharmacy School Potluck, and End of the Year Barbeque
- Established a class gift, Matthew Tucker Memorial Scholarship, given to the university upon our graduation 
- Organized various fundraisers to support the Matthew Tucker Memorial Scholarship

organizations.name: American Pharmacists Association
organizations.description:
- Motivated students to live an active and healthy lifestyle  
- Coordinated monthly fitness challenges through social media for pharmacy students

organizations.name: Phi Lambda Sigma Leadership Fraternity
organizations.description: As vice president I assist the president in scheduling speakers for our leadership series, organizing various events, and evaluating new membership applications.

organizations.name: Phi Delta Chi Professional Pharmacy Fraternity, Beta Kappa Chapter

message.text:
Today, we celebrated the beginning of construction for the new Comprehensive Cancer Center with a groundbreaking ceremony. The Gonzales Comprehensive Cancer Center name honors Dan and Dawn Gonzales, who contributed 13 acres of land in the Meriam Park community. 

The new center will relieve the critical need for expanded cancer care services in the North State. Completion is slated for the summer of 2026. Thank you to everyone who attended!
Our oncology nurses at Enloe Medical Center are absolutely the best!  I love working beside them. Happy Oncology Nursing Month!!!

Welcome to Oncology Nursing Month! This May, we honor your unwavering commitment to oncology nursing and the hope you provide to patients and their families. Get involved with this year's theme, 'Empowering Hope, Transforming Care.' Celebrate with us all month long by tagging ONS and using #OncologyNursingMonth in your posts!

Congratulations to Sheila Vrbeta and Peter Scalet for being a 2024 Enloe Medical Center Stories of Excellence recipient!  These two go above and beyond to ensure our patients have the first line therapies they need to fight cancer. I am truely greatful for all of the work you do and proud to call you my coworker!  As an added bonus, they arn’t just great at their jobs, they are fun to work with!  To read the full story and see all the recipients visit https://lnkd.in/gmJehrbx .

What an honor to be invited back to speak at the Northstate Oncology Nusing Society Fair!  I love our nurses and the incredible work they do.  Everyday I am happy to work by your side and grateful on this night to be a part of your education.  Great event 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼. 

Thank you for organizing/hosting Mary K. and Reba S. for the technology assist!
